00037 #ifndef __btkOrientedSpatialFunction_h
00038 #define __btkOrientedSpatialFunction_h
00039 
00040 #include "itkSpatialFunction.h"
00041 #include "itkFixedArray.h"
00042 #include "itkPoint.h"
00043 #include "itkMatrix.h"
00044 #include "itkVector.h"
00045 #include "itkGaussianSpatialFunction.h"
00046 #include "itkFixedArray.h"
00047 
00048 namespace btk
00049 {
00050 
00051 using namespace itk;
00052 
00061 template <typename TOutput=double,
00062           unsigned int VImageDimension=3,
00063           typename TInput=Point<double, VImageDimension> >
00064 class OrientedSpatialFunction
00065 : public SpatialFunction<TOutput, VImageDimension, TInput>
00066 {
00067 public:
00068 
00069   typedef enum {
00070     BOXCAR=0,
00071     GAUSSIAN=1,
00072   } PSF_type;
00073 
00075   typedef OrientedSpatialFunction                                 Self;
00076   typedef SpatialFunction<TOutput, VImageDimension, TInput>       Superclass;
00077   typedef SmartPointer<Self>                                      Pointer;
00078   typedef SmartPointer<const Self>                                ConstPointer;
00079 
00081   itkNewMacro(Self);
00082 
00084   itkTypeMacro(OrientedSpatialFunction, SpatialFunction);
00085 
00087   typedef typename Superclass::InputType InputType;
00088 
00090   typedef typename Superclass::OutputType OutputType;
00091 
00093   typedef Matrix<double,VImageDimension,VImageDimension>  DirectionType;
00094 
00096   typedef Point<double,VImageDimension>  PointType;
00097 
00099   typedef Vector<double,VImageDimension>  SpacingType;
00100 
00102   typedef GaussianSpatialFunction< double,
00103                                    VImageDimension,
00104                                    PointType> GaussianFunctionType;
00105 
00107   typedef FixedArray<double,VImageDimension> ArrayType;
00108 
00109 
00111   OutputType Evaluate(const TInput& position) const;
00112 
00116   void SetSpacing(SpacingType spacing)
00117   {
00118     m_Spacing = spacing.GetVnlVector();
00119 
00120     ArrayType sigma;
00121 
00122     sigma[0] = 0.5*m_Spacing[0];
00123     sigma[1] = 0.5*m_Spacing[1];
00124     sigma[2] = 0.5*m_Spacing[2];
00125 
00126     m_Gaussian -> SetSigma( sigma );
00127 
00128   }
00129 
00131   void SetDirection(DirectionType direction)
00132   {
00133     m_Direction = direction.GetVnlMatrix();
00134     m_idir = m_Direction.get_column(0);
00135     m_jdir = m_Direction.get_column(1);
00136     m_kdir = m_Direction.get_column(2);
00137   }
00138 
00140   void SetCenter(PointType center)
00141   {
00142     m_Center = center.GetVnlVector();
00143   }
00144 
00146   itkSetMacro(PSF, unsigned int);
00147   itkGetMacro(PSF, unsigned int);
00148 
00149 
00150 protected:
00151   OrientedSpatialFunction();
00152   virtual ~OrientedSpatialFunction();
00153   void PrintSelf(std::ostream& os, Indent indent) const;
00154 
00155 private:
00156   OrientedSpatialFunction(const Self&); //purposely not implemented
00157   void operator=(const Self&); //purposely not implemented
00158 
00159   vnl_matrix<double> m_Direction;
00160   vnl_vector<double> m_Center;
00161   vnl_vector<double> m_Spacing;
00162 
00163   vnl_vector<double> m_idir;
00164   vnl_vector<double> m_jdir;
00165   vnl_vector<double> m_kdir;
00166 
00167   unsigned int m_PSF;
00168 
00169   typename GaussianFunctionType::Pointer m_Gaussian;
00170 
00171 
00172 };
00173 
00174 } // end namespace itk
00175

00179   _(3(class EXPORT OrientedSpatialFunction< ITK_TEMPLATE_3 x >)) \
00180   namespace Templates { typedef OrientedSpatialFunction< ITK_TEMPLATE_3 x >\
00181                                                  OrientedSpatialFunction##y; } \
00182   }
